words.ex: The locals were remarkably xenial toward visitors.
The campaign aimed to reduce xenophobia through education.
His xenophobic remarks caused public outrage.
The desert is home to many xerophytes.
Her performance had that elusive x‑factor.
The novel explores xenogenesis as a central theme.
The child played a simple melody on the xylophone.
Water travels upward through the plant’s xylem.
